00143 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00144 {
00145     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00146 
00147     if ( globalThresholdingTime_.get() != 0 )
00148         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_.get();
00149 
00150     if ( templateFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00151         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_.get();
00152 
00153     if ( averagingFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00154         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_.get();
00155 
00156     if ( skeletonizationTime_.get() != 0 )
00157         totalTime_ += *skeletonizationTime_.get();
00158 
00159     if ( segmentationTime_.get() != 0 )
00160         totalTime_ += *segmentationTime_.get();
00161 
00162     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_.get() != 0 )
00163         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_.get();
00164     
00165     if ( patternsBuildingTime_.get() != 0 )
00166         totalTime_ += *patternsBuildingTime_.get();
00167 };
